readable.title: 2844963839_ff09cdb81f
readable.content: a group of football players huddled together in the middle of the field . A group of football players wearing orange and blue uniforms gather together on the field . Football players in blue and orange uniforms are huddled together and hugging each other . Football players in uniform embrace one another . The men in the Gators helmets have their arms wrapped around each other .
